ingredients.name: Large Egg
ingredients.notes: separate whites from 3 of the eggs

steps.text: In a saucepan, whisk together flour, salt, and 1/2 cup of sugar
Stir in the eggs (minus the 3 separated whites) and the milk
Cook uncovered, stirring often, until mixture thickens, about 10 minutes
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla
Cut the bananas into 1/8 inch thick slices
In a 1.5 quart casserole dish, construct the layers
Spread a thin layer of pudding, then place wafers flat over the pudding, followed by a layer of banana slices
Repeat layering until ingredients are used up, ending with a layer of pudding, set aside
In an electric mixer, add the egg whites and a pinch of salt
Beat until the meringue becomes stiff
Slowly add 1/4 cup of sugar while beating
Using a spatula, spread meringue over the pudding, making decorative peaks
Bake until lightly browned, approximately 5 minutes
